#summary Information about the Mapping Service

<h1>!AusStage Mapping Service</h1>

The [http://beta.ausstage.edu.au/mapping Mapping Events] service provides an interface to enables researchers to search, display and visually analyse information about live performance on a map. It introduces geographic capabilities to research applications of AusStage dataset. It is one of three [https://www.pfc.org.au/bin/view/Main/NeAT NeAT] funded services to enhance the research capabilities of the [http://www.ausstage.edu.au AusStage] database.

The goal of the Mapping Service is to allow users to create maps that visualise event data. 

More information on the service is available via the [http://beta.ausstage.edu.au/mapping AusStage Mapping Service] homepage.
